root.name: Frontier Gate
root.description: OverviewFrontier Gate is a new role-playing game developed by tri-Ace whose team includes Elebits creator Shingo Mukaitoge, Suikoden Tierkreis director Osamu Komuta, and Yuzo Amano who worked on two of the Tales games.The game is set to release on December 22, 2011 in Japan. No word yet on an US release.GameplayThe game is similar to that of Monster Hunter because of the large beasts which you fight as well as field exploration. The game features an action oriented turn-based fighting system.
